content: Even with importance at 0 it's way too seizury. Needs to be much more subtle. Also it needs to hone in on the beat more instead of playing every note which becomes unintelligible chaos. A configurable low pass filter would be nice too--the loudness and duration filters aren't good enough. As is, I won't use this app. It gives me a headache. I regret paying for premium.
Really does what it claims to do and does it really well. Great job developer!
Great idea. Works well. Any chance of a version to sync with Amazon Music app?
Like the other review say this is absolutely one of the best, if not the best music app for Philips hue lights. I didn't even have Spotify so I downloaded it just to try it.
Could never get the actual spotify app connected. Leaving the app and coming back forgets a lot of settings - otherwise has potential.

I don't usually leave reviews but this is without doubt the coolest app I've ever used. Work seamlessly with the bulbs, easy to set up and looks amazing. Haven't paid for the upgrade yet but I am considering it.
So I just bought it how do I start it up
absolute loving.. cool app for Hue lights.. it breeze.. u convinced to go premium within few minutes.. love to add support for nanoleaf canvas, and MI lights too within this app
This app has amazing options!! For beginners or for advanced Phillips Hue users.

Fantastic app, really well made. Paid for premium within 5 minutes of trying it. I would however like to be able to save profiles and see more default profile options. Also I find when using Google speaker groups the lag is actually about 2.2s, which is just outside the range of the app - please increase the range! Thanks :D

This app is incredible. I spent forever trying to get other apps to work well and be responsive with my setup, this app near instantly worked great. I spent an equal amount of time just dialing in my effects to perfection instead of just trying to get them to function. I know I will never be bored with this app installed! Thanks!

Absolutely love it!!! Best music app for the hue system. Love the Spotify connection, makes it work perfectly in sync with lights and music. I did upgrade to the pro version cause I was happy to pay for such an awesome app. Only issue is it can stop working when the app is not open. But other than that I can't fault it. Thanks for an awesome app, love your work

Exactly what was looking for. I run Spotify Connect on my mobile phone to play music on my Playstation 4. Since the Playstation doesn't offer any hue apps, this is app is a great option. I like that it doesn't use the microphone and instead directly uses the music stream to alter the lights. It is also great that the free version supports all lights. This gives a good hint what to expect from the full version. And I was not disappointed when I switched to the full one. Great app.
